channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - November 27, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-november-27-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _3:16 Carnage Amongst the Stars_ * _Academy of the Blade_ * _Checkpoint Midnight_ * _Electric Bastionland_ * _Hearts of Wulin_ * _Lady Blackbird_ * _Scum and Villainy_ * _Season of Dreams_ * _Trophy Dark_ * _Ultraviolet Grasslands_ * _Voidheart Symphony_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar Firebase](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!

@flatvurm wrote:
